title: Summer Internships 2023 (India)
description:
About the job
        


        
                  Would you like the opportunity to work in a global energy company?
Do you enjoy taking on challenging projects?
Join our innovating Internship Program
The Baker Hughes Internship is designed to enable undergraduates pursing a Bachelors or Masters degree to gain hands-on work experience as the foundation of their professional lives. Our internships will give you first-hand insights into the processes, systems and practices that are aligned to ensure customer needs are met through flawless execution and the application of leading-edge technology. These internships duration are 6-11 months.
Partner with the best
You'll participate in focused training, team meetings and work on projects and present your results. During your internship you will be supported by a buddy and your manager who will ensure you have a valuable learning experience. You will also have the opportunity to become familiar with our Health, Safety and Environment (HS&E) and culture of Baker Hughes.
As an Intern, you will be responsible for:

Completing internal projects to deliver customer outcomes and identify business improvements Learning internal software to assist with the completion of projects and tasks Collaborating with cross-functional teams and interns to interact and network with global business leaders Applying Health, Safety and Environment (HS&E) standards and procedures in all situations to ensure compliance is maintained Receiving coaching and mentoring to enable you to complete assignments and projects to develop your learning and skillset.

Fuel your passion
To be successful in this role you will:

Be currently enrolled in MTech degree in Computer Science, Chemical, Control/Instrumentation or relevantBe a high achiever and maintained a cumulative GPA 3.0/4.0 or equivalent in your country.Be fluent in oral and written EnglishBe in your in your final or penultimate year of degree studies Have the legal right to work without restrictions in the country you have applied

Work in a way that works for you
We recognize that everyone is different and that the way in which people want to work and deliver at their best is different for everyone too. For us flexibility works both ways, depending on your assignment rotation there maybe occasions where you will be able to work remotely.
Working with us
Working at Baker Hughes means being at the forefront of the energy transition. Our people are diverse, ambitious and collaborative. Were on a mission to redefine the energy sector by unlocking the power of engineering, data and science.
The Good Stuff
Our inventions have revolutionised energy for over a century. But to keep going forward tomorrow, we know we have to push the boundaries today. We prioritize rewarding those who embrace challenge with a package that reflects how much we value their input.
About Us:
We are an energy technology company that provides solutions to energy and industrial customers worldwide. Built on a century of experience and conducting business in over 120 countries, our innovative technologies and services are taking energy forward – making it safer, cleaner and more efficient for people and the planet.
Join Us:
Are you seeking an opportunity to make a real difference in a company that values innovation and progress? Join us and become part of a team of people who will challenge and inspire you! Let’s come together and take energy forward.
Baker Hughes Company is an Equal Opportunity Employer. Employment decisions are made without regard to race, color, religion, national or ethnic origin, sex, sexual orientation, gender identity or expression, age, disability, protected veteran status or other characteristics protected by law.
R64006

title: Product Management Intern
description:
About the job
        


        
                  What is Sprinto?Sprinto is an early stage SaaS startup, working in the information security "compliance" space. This is a flourishing area, but has not seen any innovation in the last couple of decades. Thanks to some macro-changes, we think the space is ripe for a startup to become a market leader. Our job as founders and early team members is to ensure that Sprinto has a shot at this opportunity.
Why work with us?- Sprinto has an experienced founding team. Prior to Sprinto, we (Girish and Raghu) built Recruiterbox.com. We bootstrapped recruiterbox from 2011 to 2017, and scaled it to 2500+ global customers and a team of ~45 people spread across India and US. At the end of 2017, Recruiterbox was acquired by Turn/River capital.- We wrote most of the early code at Recruiterbox, and remained among the top 5 committers even when the company ran at scale. We are engineers at heart and love building scalable systems for people to coordinate, work together and build great things together- Sprinto is well capitalised from top notch investors like Accel, Elevation & Blume. While you have all the advantages of working on challenging problems that come with working in a startup, you also don't have the risk of the company running out of money.- Last but not the least, stock options. While all early stage startups offer stock options, not all of them are same. At Sprinto, we aren't satisfied with being just a large/successful company. We want to be the category leader. On a good outcome, your stint with Sprinto will leave you with no need to work for money and you only continue to work for passion.
Roles and Responsibilities- Collaboarte with relevant Stake-Holders- Work across teams to such as Marketing, Sales, Customer Experience and Engineering to ensure everything is kept track off and the ball isnt dropped off- Work on the Product Roadmap & Lifecycle- Help the product team prioritise the features and tasks and give valuable feedback based on various stakeholder conversations- Help the product and engineering teams to flesh out features and ensure there are no blockers on delivery- Work with Product Managers by using data to understand customer behaviour and performance of features; be data-driven in estimating size of impact and determining prioritisation.
What we are looking for?- A Fresher or Currently pursuing a Bachelor's or Master's Degree in Computer Science or business studies from Tier I & Tier II colleges are preferred.- Excellent communication, analytical, logical thinking, problem-solving, and writing skills.- Understanding and/or hands-on experience in software development is preferred.- Data-driven. Strong ability in analyzing data to derive insights and make decisions.- Adaptable, open-minded, and comfortable to work with ambiguity and change in the fast paced SAAS industry.- This can turn into a full time offer after a 6 month internship.

title: Summer Intern
description:
About the job
        


        
                  Job Description

Analysts are an integral part of the Investment Banking team at HSBC, providing quantitative and analytical support for mergers, acquisitions, capital raising and other financial advisory services. The analyst position is a generalist position, giving candidates exposure across different products, sectors and client types.

Analysts in the India IB team are assigned a variety of projects and have a board range of responsibilities including preparation of financial models and business valuations Creating client marketing presentations Conducting industry and company-specific due diligence related to transactions Helping with execution of Equity and Debt offerings 
Our summer analyst program is designed to give interns an experience that is as close to that of a full time analyst as possible. This includes, where possible, working on live client projects. The HSBC investment banking team has led a large number of landmark transactions and many of our past interns have had the opportunity to work on these transactions

Requirements

Candidates selected through HSBC India (Bank)’s Campus Recruitment process for 2023 Summer Internship Program.

title: Summer Intern
description:
About the job
        


        
                  Job Description

HSBC is one of the largest banking and financial services organizations in the world, with operations in 65 countries and territories. We aim to be where the growth is, enabling businesses to thrive and

economies to prosper, and, ultimately, helping people to fulfil their hopes and realize their ambitions.

We are part of global Commercial Banking and Global Banking and Markets and we support relationship managers by providing the products and expertise corporates and their clients need.

GPS helps clients, mainly corporate treasurers, to:
 Move their cash - either the cash they receive from their customers, or pay to
their staff and suppliers
 Have visibility, control and access to their cash – how much, in what currencies
and countries
 Invest their cash – we help clients manage their liquidity to ensure they make
their cash work hard for their businesses.

Our digital solutions for our corporate clients are built to enable a seamless experience for our client’s end-customers. Customers of one of the largest telecom operators in India can now make mobile bill payments effortlessly using the Unified Payments Interface (UPI), thereby reducing the use of cash. Other UPI-based digital payment solutions include movie ticket purchases at a cinema chain, airline ticket purchases, etc. On the payments front, our smart routing solution – built using the IMPS and NEFT rails – has enabled one of the largest microfinance Institutions in the country make instant loan disbursals to its

customers, many of who hail from the bottom of the income pyramid. This again reduces the usage of cash and brings these borrowers into the financial system.

Requirements

Candidates selected through HSBC India (Bank)’s Campus Recruitment process for 2023 Summer Internship Program.

title: Company Secretary Intern
description:
About the job
        


        
                  Know the CompanyCoinSwitch breaks down the complexities in Crypto, empowering the everyday Indian to make informed investment decisions on a simple and trusted platform. When we started up, Crypto was a field reserved for specialists. Today, over 18 million users trust CoinSwitch to learn, purchase and invest in Crypto. That makes us India’s largest crypto app.On CoinSwitch, users can invest in Crypto with a few simple taps, either as a one-time purchase or in regular intervals through a SIP. But simplicity is not a substitute for informed decisions. A CoinSwitch user spends 27 minutes on our app—to learn about Crypto and Web3 through our educational content and understand the market sentiments through CRE8, the Crypto Rupee Index.But we are just getting started. CoinSwitch not only plans to double down on making Crypto accessible to everyone but is on track to become the one-stop wealth-tech destination for every Indian.For more information about CoinSwitch, find additional resources here: https://linktr.ee/coinswitchcareers 
About the Role:We are looking for a highly motivated individual to join our team as a Company SecretaryIntern. The ideal candidate should be a self-starter with strong organizational and communication skills.The intern will be responsible for providing administrative and organizational support to the Company.Secretary and assisting with compliance tasks related to corporate governance.
What You Will Do:Supporting the Company Secretary in conducting Board/shareholders’/committee meetings andpreparation of notice, agenda and minutes, and other secretarial documents.Assisting with the maintenance of statutory books and records.Conducting research on the company, FDI, and other applicable laws and regulations.Assisting with the preparation of regulatory filings and filings for shareholder meetings.Performing other administrative tasks as required.Coordinating with various internal and external stakeholders. 
What You Should Have:Must have passed the final examination of ICSI.Should be available for an internship period of 15 months or more.Excellent organizational and communication skillsStrong attention to detailProficient in Microsoft Office.Candidates with prior work experience in secretarial matters in any firm/organization will begiven preference.Familiarity with FDI, SEBI laws, and regulations is a plus.
Life at CoinSwitchWe take great pride in what we do, and are committed to our mission. And we have a lot of fun while at it!Here’s how we do things at CoinSwitch:Customer-first: That’s the North Star. Everything we do is to make our users’ investment experience better and simplified.Ownership: We don’t sport lab coats, but we experiment—a lot. And we take ownership. We even have a catchphrase for this: Think big, fail fast, and build better.Data-driven: The source of truth. Simple as that.Fun: PS5, anyone? Or do you prefer Foosball? Or perhaps Carrom? And yes, our HR team has a whole list of activities: Disco nights, off-sites, gift boxes, and more!Speaking of lists, the perks and benefits are so extensive, this space isn’t enough. Here are a few:Parenthood: Up to 8 months of Maternity leave and 1 month of Paternity leaveGender Reassignment Surgery: Be the best version of you! We’ll support you and reimburse your medical bill.
Disclaimer: We are an equal opportunity employer committed to building a respectful and empowering work environment for all people to freely express themselves amongst colleagues who embrace diversity in all respects. Including fresh voices and unique points of view in all aspects of our business not only creates an environment where we can all grow and thrive but also increases our potential to produce work that better represents—and resonates with—the world around us.

title: Legal Intern
description:
About the job
        


        
                  About CoinDCX
Trusted by more than 1.3 crore Indians, CoinDCX is one of the largest players in India's crypto ecosystem. Our vision is to create a more open and accessible future and we believe that web 3 will play an important part. Apart from offering simple investment and trading products for Indians to enter the crypto space, we’ve also ventured into Web 3 in 2021 by investing in promising Indian Web 3 startups via CoinDCX Ventures, launching Okto - a Defi app to access thousands of crypto assets on multiple decentralised exchanges across chains. And we’re just getting started! We’re always learning and building something new at CoinDCX .
The Web 3 space is still new and we’re just getting started!
Inside CoinDCX’s Legal Team
Our Legal team is an awesome group of collaborators, who love to solve first of its kind problems with a lot of autonomy, creativity and fun.They combine creativity and intellectual diligence with the organisational skills to manage policy campaigns that are pertinent to the company’s products and services and advocating on behalf of the company with government stakeholders.At CoinDCX you not only will be the skill of the future but also you will get to work and learn from the best while building the future of Web3.Coin your trust in us as we create magic together!
Who you are (Soft Skills)
You’re passionate about everything Crypto and Web3.0You take ownership and have a thirst for excellence with an impact driven and result oriented mindset.You grow while helping others grow with youYou thrive on change, have attention to detail and passion for qualityYou love exploring new ideas to build something useful and are always curious to learn.
What you’ll do
Drafting, vetting, negotiating and closing various documents including but not limited to Non-Disclosure Agreements, Marketing and Branding Agreements, Terms and Conditions, Service Agreements, Alliance and Partnership agreements and other documents.Assisting in drafting/ vetting of legal notices, replies, affidavits, power of attorney etc.Updating the team with the updates on Blockchain and crypto space globally with a focus on providing regulatory updates.Keeping a track of the regulatory/ policy developments happening in the Indian crypto space.Interacting with internal and external stakeholders, as may be required.Undertaking research and preparation of notes/ summary document in relation thereto, as and when required.
What you’ll bring (Hard Skills)
Should have prior internship experience of not less than six months at a Tier - I or Tier -II Law firm or with any in house legal team (preference - NBFC/ fintech).Basic understanding of Corporate law with a working knowledge of Contract Law; IPR laws, Banking Laws and Civil and Criminal laws.Basic knowledge of the crypto industry is definitely a plus point. We are looking for people who are passionate about this space
Note: This is a 6 months paid internship with a possibility of being converted into full-time.
What’s in it for you 
Unlimited Wellness LeavesPersonalised Mental Wellness & Caregiving sessions by ExpertsRecharge and Rejuvenate through team outingsDYOB - Design your Own BenefitLinkedIn Learning

Drafting, vetting, negotiating and closing various documents including but not limited to Non-Disclosure Agreements, Marketing and Branding Agreements, Terms and Conditions, Service Agreements, Alliance and Partnership agreements and other documents.Assisting in drafting/ vetting of legal notices, replies, affidavits, power of attorney etc.Updating the team with the updates on Blockchain and crypto space globally with a focus on providing regulatory updates.Keeping a track of the regulatory/ policy developments happening in the Indian crypto space.Interacting with internal and external stakeholders, as may be required.Undertaking research and preparation of notes/ summary document in relation thereto, as and when required.
What you’ll bring (Hard Skills)
Should have prior internship experience of not less than six months at a Tier - I or Tier -II Law firm or with any in house legal team (preference - NBFC/ fintech).Basic understanding of Corporate law with a working knowledge of Contract Law; IPR laws, Banking Laws and Civil and Criminal laws.Basic knowledge of the crypto industry is definitely a plus point. We are looking for people who are passionate about this space
Note: This is a 6 months paid internship with a possibility of being converted into full-time.
What’s in it for you 
Unlimited Wellness LeavesPersonalised Mental Wellness & Caregiving sessions by ExpertsRecharge and Rejuvenate through team outingsDYOB - Design your Own BenefitLinkedIn Learning

title: PeopleOps Trainee (Internship Track: HR Generalist)
description:
About the job
        


        
                  This is a remote position.

KraftPixel is a bespoke IT development services company grateful to be working with clients like Angel Broking, HDFC Bank Limited, Kapiva, Acko General Insurance, Superkicks and more, carrying a focus on projects in the web domain. We are looking for a high-ownership internship candidate with the basic functional know-how of HR responsibilities so that she/he can seamlessly work on hiring, culture and long-term nurturing of talent at the company.

Your Missions at KraftPixel
Learning and managing HR responsibilities at the company to meet the KPIs - increasing inbound "hire me" requests, in-time hiring for positions, culture growth etc. Practically learning to support the founders by maintaining Google Sheets to give them regular updates on the progress of PeopleOps goals.Practically learning to support the management by contributing to employee growth ideas and initiatives undertaken by the management
Requirements

Must-have Hard Skills that you will be working on acquiring:

Technical Competence
Google Sheets and other relevant collaborative softwaresPeopleOps skills - talent hunting, negotiation, building JDs etc.A mindset that understands how an IT business functions and can identify loopholes and come up with ideas for the growth of the organizationBasic theoretical knowledge about coding languages in use at the companyAnalytical and Task Planning Skills towards achievement of hiring goals
Must-have Soft Skills that you will be practically learning on acquiring

Human Resources
Proficient English communication skills, both written as well as spoken EnglishAn attitude of high ownership in everything you do at KraftPixel. Outcome > Output always.Time management Constructive feedback gathering and feedback giving skills
Benefits As a Part Of This Internship
This is a minimum 7 months to a maximum 15 months internship. Your initial stipend will be set to 2.5k; your stipend will increase with time between a range of 0 - 2.5k every 3 months of internship depending on whether you acquire the necessary skillsets as a reward for your dedication. This will increase to a max limit of Rs. 12.5k/month.Upon completion of 9 months of internship, a full-time job offer will be presented to the internship candidates who have performed nothing short of excellent. You have to clock 184 hours compulsorily in a month, so if you are a student with offline college, this internship may not work for you.If you are not selected for a full-time offer, you will receive a neat-looking certificate that will help you in your further career.You will be eligible to opt for laptop assignment from the company to work on.Certificate only if you complete 6 months of internship; and LOR only upon completion of 9 months of internship. Work Timings and Leave Policy
Monday to Friday, 9 hours of your choice daily, remote working, asynchronous modeSaturday Sundays off except in cases of need, equitable overtime paid leaves will be given1 paid leave allowed per monthIf you are a final year student, actual exam days will be sponsored as paid leave by the company.

title: Data Science Intern
description:
About the job
        


        
                  Job Title: Data Science InternshipDuration: May-JuneLocation: Remote, Online
Welcome to NodeX, a platform designed to empower early-career engineering students by providing them with opportunities to work on industrial projects and research papers in the fields of Data Science and Machine Learning. We are excited to announce that we are currently seeking motivated and ambitious early-career engineering students, preferably in their early years to join our platform.
Our services include providing students with base-level research exposure, industrial projects and internships, professional consultation and guidance throughout the process of publishing papers to journals and conferences, as well as throughout the duration of the project from industry experts and professional researchers.
At NodeX, we pride ourselves in offering a unique service that goes beyond traditional mentorship and courses. Our platform provides research and industrial-project experience under the guidance of our expert mentors, and we also offer project completion opportunities with certifications and documents such as an Internship Completion Certificate and a Letter of Recommendation (performance-based), which can strengthen your CV and work experience during your senior year applications.
In addition, at NodeX, you can collaborate with other sharp-minded students from different universities who are working on the same topic as you, and even team up with each other to work on projects or research together, thereby expanding your network and gaining valuable experience.
Here's a revised summary of what we provide:
Provision of paid projects from small scale startups as well as independent projects working towards a cause.Project experience with guidance from industry professionals and mentors, as well as constant doubt clearing sessions.Research exposure and assistance in the entire process of writing and publishing a paper/article. Assistance is provided in writing as well as publishing by PhD Scholars and Research professionals.Collaborating with alumni and other like-minded students to work on the same project/research and broaden your network.Certifications such as an Internship Completion Certificate, a Letter of Excellence, and a Letter of Recommendation (performance-based).Boost your CV with publications, projects, and certifications.
For this job role, please note that we will be hiring candidates through a two-step process of resume screening and personal interviews. We will carefully assess each applicant's qualifications, skills, and experience to select the best candidates for the position. We wish you the best of luck in your application and hope to welcome you to our community soon!
Thank you for your interest in NodeX. If you have any queries, please reach out to us at contact@nodex.services

                  About En-Kash
Website
En-Kash has two-pronged strategies to meet its vision, one part focuses on the mass market of SMEs, which is critical to the Indian success story and the other part focuses on bringing more meaningful and impactful training solutions to the top companies in India. Our model of working with professional training partners, with a low-cost model, intends to bring down the training cost and make it affordable to each and every company and individual. We have decided to cut costs on things like advertising, swanky office premises, luxury stay, hi-end travel, etc. But at the same time, we would never cut cost on trainer quality, use of latest methodologies & meeting commitments to our customers. In short, we would cut costs on the items, which intend to provide luxury and comfort to us and not add value to the customer, but not cutting costs on items, which provide the best of services and solutions to our customers.

title: Internship - Talent Acquisition - Freshers
description:
About the job
        


        
                  This is a remote position.

About MintSkill HR Solutions LLP

MintSkill HR Solutions LLP ( www.mintskill.com ) is an Executive Search, HR consulting organization that focuses on talent acquisition, talent development, and talent management. MintSkill helps companies to source, recruit and manage the talent they need to succeed in an increasingly competitive business world.

What would a Trainee - Recruiter learn during the internship? 

Other than developing a thorough understanding of search, recruitment, selection, assessment, and how to build relationships with the applicants, how to search and select to recruit managers and Sr. executives for banks, financial institutions, and many more. They will also get to learn how to use HR software, HR analytics, Talent Acquisition, Investment Banking, Wealth Management, Data analytics, Candidate assessment,Training and development, compensation and benefits, interview training and development, HRIS,  how to write job descriptions, use various job boards, Application Tracking System, telephonic search and interview, and personal interviews. They will also learn a lot about how an HR business works.

Who can apply: Only those candidates can apply who:
are available for full time at Navi Mumbai Kharghar 5 min walk from Railway station or Highway.Work from home is available on a case to case basis. Engineering Graduate /MBA and have relevant skills and interests
Duration Of Internship
3 to 6 Months
About The Job

Selected HR Trainee day-to-day responsibilities include:
Manage recruitment life cycleSearch requirements of hiring, connect with hiring and talent acquisition managerSend contact information and email to discuss the Hiring requirements.Source the candidate using social media, job boards, WhatsApp, etc., call the interested candidates, and screen for eligibility and interest.Learn, manage and prioritise multiple searches for hiring projects.Research and learn various domain and industry trends and understand the manpower requirements. Work on cold calling candidates, to meet the hiring requirementsHandle volume and quality recruiting in a fast-paced and structured environment adhering to the strict deadlines.Perform search, screen, shortlist candidates as per business requirements.Conduct telephonic or video interview of candidate sourced by the traineeWork on calling and emailing the candidate and following up till onboarding. 
Requirements

Qualification required: 

Graduation / Post Graduate completed in 2023 in or earlier.

Working remotely .
Workstation with Camera or Dedicated Laptop Smart phone with SIM 10MBPS Internet connection Skill(s) required :
Social Media Marketing RecruitmentAnalytical and reading comprehension skillsMS-ExcelEnglish Proficiency (Spoken)English Proficiency (Written)Telephonic conversation skills, Internet search, MS office , Email writing
Candidate Attributes

Good communication, Ability to deliver results and Target Driven recruitment environment

Should have good communication and convincing skills.

Benefits

Selection Process :
Job ApplicationAptitude TestVideo InterviewPersonal Interview for applicants in Navi Mumbai, OR online. Joining Process
Selected applicants will be offered a conditional offer letter, subject to completion of 10 days of online training by company. Trainees need to complete the assignments during the training.Daily online meeting during the training programAssessment / Test based on online training. Trainees who are successful in the test, will be absorbed as HR Recruiter - Trainee and will start 2 month On the Job Training. Performance evaluation during two months on the Job training to be absorbed as full time employee. 
Compensation And Benefits
During the On the Job training, Trainees will be provided with consolidated Stipend +incentive per joining
Perks
Trainees will be provided with Training completion certificate after completing minimum 90 days. Performance review and appraisal cycle every six months. Entire cost of the training, assessment and certification is paid by Mintskill HR Solutions. Attractive Incentives for achievers, Award and recognition program Successful employees who complete 3 years will be sponsored Management program as per Mintskill requirements, from leading Universities. 
Requirements Note : Applicants who are not available for at least 3 months need not apply.

title: Internship Opportunities
description:
About the job
        


        
                  Company Description
WEQ Technologies is not just a software company but strives to become a technology partner for its clients. We builds software for businesses that require industrial automation, smart inventory management and other IT solutions to stay ahead in market. At WEQ, we are aware that creating client-oriented solution takes a mixture of technical excellence and clear communication. We know that every client is unique, and we strive to deliver an individual, innovative and cost effective solution every time. We provide Technological Partnership & Support, Software Product Development, Website Development, Digital Marketing.
Job Description
Responsibilities:
Work with our development team to implement and maintain various projects. Collaborate with cross-functional teams to resolve technical issues and improve software. Write clean and maintainable code using best practices and standards. Participate in code reviews, technical discussions, and presentations. Keep up-to-date with the latest advancements and trends in web development. 
Requirements:
Strong proficiency in HTML, CSS, and JavaScript. Good knowledge of React, Node, Angular, or any other frontend framework. Familiarity with Git, GitHub, or any other version control system. Excellent problem-solving skills and attention to detail. Good communication and interpersonal skills. Passion for learning and developing new technologies.  Additional Information
Flexible Working Hours

The Black & Veatch Summer Internship Program is designed to provide the following to students:
Experience in a working environmentMeaningful work assignmentsIntroduction to Black and Veatch corporate cultureChance to network with experienced executives, leading professionals, and peersOpportunity to learn and expand classroom theory into practiceEarn excellent hourly wage
Key Responsibilities  Day to day activities will include compiling data through desktop research on power plants - configuration, technical parameters like heat rate, availability, etc. and energy demand. This data will need to be compiled for various Asian countries. The intern will get an opportunity to gain experience in data compilation for the eventual goal of energy market modelling. Intern will get an opportunity to interact with some of the subject matter experts in various areas of energy sector. Perform research, data analysis and report-writing for projectsConduct economic and financial studies for utilities, developers and/or independent power producers in several of the following areas:Power supply planning studiesIntegrated Resource Planning (IRP)Feasibility studies for domestic or international power generation projectsDeregulation, restructuring and competitive positioning servicesElectric market price forecastingAsset valuationProject development including project structuring and Developing/reviewing/negotiating project agreementsIndividual contributor with no subordinates 
#
Management Responsibilities
Individual Contributor
Preferred Qualifications
M.tech in Electrical or Mechanical engineering is mandatory
Previous work experience of 1-3 years would be considered.
Should be fine with 2-3 months Internship program.
Minimum Qualifications
Current enrollment in accredited university in Finance, Economics, Engineering or related field of study. No previous experience required. All applicants must be able to complete pre-employment onboarding requirements (if selected) which may include any/all of the following: criminal/civil background check, drug screen, and motor vehicle records search, in compliance with any applicable laws and regulations.
Certifications
Work Environment/Physical Demands
Normal Office environment
Competencies
Salary Plan
CST: Consulting
Job Grade
097

Black & Veatch is committed to being an employer of choice by creating a valuable work experience that keeps our people engaged, productive, safe and healthy. We offer professionals an array of health and welfare benefits that vary based on their geographic region and employment status. This may include health, life accident and disability insurances, paid time off, financial programs and more. Professionals may also be eligible for a performance-based bonus program.
By valuing diverse voices and perspectives, we cultivate an authentically inclusive environment for professionals and are able to provide innovative and effective solutions for clients.

title: 2023 Summer Internship - Software Engineering - India
description:
About the job
        


        
                  The Trade Desk is changing the way global brands and their agencies advertise to audiences around the world. How? With a media buying platform that helps brands deliver a more insightful and relevant ad experience for consumers – and sets a new standard for global reach, accuracy, and transparency. We are proud of the culture we have built. We value the unique experiences and perspectives that each person brings to The Trade Desk, and we are committed to fostering inclusive spaces where everyone can bring their authentic selves to work every day.

So, if you are talented, driven, creative, and eager to join a dynamic, globally-connected team, then we want to talk!

What You’ll Do

 Own and ship a meaningful project, end-to-end. We believe strongly in ownership at The Trade Desk, and we are committed to you having something substantial to show for your time here that will make a positive Impact for the team Receive close, one-on-one mentorship from an experienced software engineer Collaborate with a globally connected team of engineers, Interns & other teams and departments in cities across the world Work with new technologies across a wide spectrum of computer science, including distributed systems, petabyte-scale data processing, machine learning/AI, and UI/UX

Who you are

You might be a great fit for a Software Engineer internship at The Trade Desk if:

 You are fluent in one or more modern programming languages Have a firm grasp on basic data structures and algorithmic techniques You are a quick and self-directed learner. We provide close support and mentorship, but you will have ownership over the design, plan, and implementation of what you build. Enrolled in a bachelor's degree in Computer Science / Engineering / IT or related program Have a graduation date between Summer 2024 and Winter 2024 You can work at our Bangalore office for 12 weeks during Summer 2023 (Time Period: between late May – late Aug 2023)

The Trade Desk does not accept unsolicited resumes from search firm recruiters. Fees will not be paid in the event a candidate submitted by a recruiter without an agreement in place is hired; such resumes will be deemed the sole property of The Trade Desk. The Trade Desk is an equal opportunity employer. All aspects of employment will be based on merit, competence, performance, and business needs. We do not discriminate on the basis of race, color, religion, marital status, age, national origin, ancestry, physical or mental disability, medical condition, pregnancy, genetic information, gender, sexual orientation, gender identity or expression, veteran status, or any other status protected under federal, state, or local law.

title: FMDP intern
description:
About the job
        


        
                  Job Description Summary 

Every intern has the opportunity to make a real impact during their tenure – assignments vary by business, location, and business needs but they are all challenging and rewarding. GE interns join a community that is there to help them, challenge them, and develop them. They work together to solve real-world challenges, sometimes spurring innovations that change the way we do business. An internship at GE is an opportunity to learn while doing.GE HealthCare is a leading global medical technology and digital solutions innovator. Our purpose is to create a world where healthcare has no limits. Unlock your ambition, turn ideas into world-changing realities, and join an organization where every voice makes a difference, and every difference builds a healthier world.

Job Description

 Roles & Responsibilities: 

You will collaborate on exciting projects, not only with talented peers, but with top leaders in your field—most of whom began as interns and co-ops themselves.Your intern assignment, generally 10-12 weeks,

 Qualifications/Requirements: 

Enrolled in Master’s or Bachelor Degree program focusing on financeGPA greater than or equal to 3.0/4.0

Desired Competencies

Demonstrated leadership skills, project management skills, and organization skillsAbility to simplify and communicate complex dataWell-developed written and oral communication skills, research skills, and business acumenUnyielding integrityAttributes such as a hunger to win, accountability, curiosity, authenticity, agility, candourWillingness to take initiative, roll up one’s sleeves, get the work done, and celebrate big wins and lessons learnedAbility to understand business strategy and organizational structureMust be geographically mobile (locations vary based on businesses)Legal authorization to work in the country/region where the business is hiring is required. We will not sponsor individuals for employment visas, now or in the future, for this job.

 Inclusion and Diversity 

 GE Healthcare is an Equal Opportunity Employer where inclusion matters. Employment decisions are made without regard to race, color, religion, national or ethnic origin, sex, sexual orientation, gender identity or expression, age, disability, protected veteran status or other characteristics protected by law. 

 We expect all employees to live and breathe our behaviors: to act with humility and build trust; lead with transparency; deliver with focus, and drive ownership – always with unyielding integrity. 

 Our  total rewards  are designed to unlock your ambition by giving you the boost and flexibility you need to turn your ideas into world-changing realities. Our salary and benefits are everything you’d expect from an organization with global strength and scale, and you’ll be surrounded by career opportunities in a culture that fosters care, collaboration and support. 

 Additional Information 

Relocation Assistance Provided: Yes

title: Brand Alliance and Partnership - Internship
description:
About the job
        


        
                  About Us:
Paytm is India’s leading digital payments and financial services company, which is focused on driving consumers and merchants to its platform by offering them a variety of payment use cases. Paytm provides consumers with services like utility payments and money transfers, while empowering them to pay via Paytm Payment Instruments (PPI) like Paytm Wallet, Paytm UPI, Paytm Payments Bank Netbanking, Paytm FASTag and Paytm Postpaid - Buy Now, Pay Later. To merchants, Paytm offers acquiring devices like Soundbox, EDC, QR and Payment Gateway where payment aggregation is done through PPI and also other banks’ financial instruments. To further enhance merchants’ business, Paytm offers merchants commerce services through advertising and Paytm Mini app store. Operating on this platform leverage, the company then offers credit services such as merchant loans, personal loans and BNPL, sourced by its financial partners.
About Team :
Growth marketing team at Paytm performs these critical functions for our platform:
 Traffic allocation to various growth use cases like payments, commerce, financial services according to user current interest and also propensity to adopt new use cases Enhancing growth as a product platform with real time targeting, building a 360-degree customer profile and enhancing reach through most suitable channels Evangelization of growth amongst various businesses of Paytm and ensuring best practices trickle down to all businesses

About Role :
New business development through lead generation using professional contacts, websites, LinkedIn, market and store visits, lead funnel & pipeline development, lead closure, co- marketing campaigns with brands. Revenue generation through new and existing partnership
Expectations/ Requirements:
 Ability to work independently on both strategic and operational tasks in a dynamic, fast-paced and

hands-on environment.
 Deep state specific and local / regional consumer and merchant understanding which would translate

into actionable plans.
 Work closely with sales & operations teams across the state to understand market challenges and

devise strategies to overcome them.
 Travel to different markets to develop market pulse and deeper understanding of consumers Develop marketing strategies based on problems identified and timely execute them Work on initiatives which lead to increase in Brand awareness scores and other parameters Use of all channels of communications to amplify the brand spends Competition mapping and targeting to yield quick gain results.

Superpowers/ Skills that will help you succeed in this role:
 Self motivated, go getter with proven track record of achievement who leverages the experience and

delivers as per the targets.
 Basic knowledge of ATL, BTL, Digital (media & Social), consumer research, engagement and

analytics.
 Have great understanding of local market and state specific consumer nuances and engagement

elements / occasions to leverage the opportunity to connect with consumers.
 Strong oral and written communication skills Analytical and rational mind-set to objectively evaluate business problem and provide solution Team player and multitasker with exceptional follow-up and task closure attitude Knowledge of the fintech payment industry would be added advantage Strong interpersonal skills to manage internal / external stakeholders Should be able to stretch oneself to achieve overall objectives set

Education:
Graduate/Pursuing post-graduation
Why join us:
A collaborative output driven program that brings cohesiveness across businesses through technology. Improve the average revenue per use by increasing the cross-sell opportunities. A solid 360 feedback from your peer teams on your support of their goals.
Compensation:
If you are the right fit, we believe in creating wealth for you with enviable 500 mn+ registered users, 21 mn+ merchants and depth of data in our ecosystem, we are in a unique position to democratize credit for deserving consumers & merchants – and we are committed to it. India’s largest digital lending story is brewing here. It’s your opportunity to be a part of the story!

title: Springboard Client Servicing Internship
description:
About the job
        


        
                  About Us
As a company with studios across the globe, we power up the best minds from 31 teams in over 22 countries to create a unique skillset for each client. We spark ingenuity with global creative sprints that cross time zones and borders and spur on the best of our talent. That includes exceptional brand consulting and strategic design, brilliance in experience, retail and workplace design, and competition-smashing motion design. We are part of the WPP group.
Our commitment to diversity and inclusion
We believe diversity brings creativity, which is at the heart of everything we do. We are actively engaging in creating an environment free of discrimination, where our people and their uniqueness can shine and be celebrated. We’re working to set a standard for the industry as a whole, creating a culture of equity and belonging. We may not be perfect, and we know there is work to do, but we regularly check with our teams and Employee Resource Groups on how we are doing, using their insight to frame our thinking and actions, so we can all do better, working as one Landor & Fitch.

title: Technical Trainer Intern (Training & Enablement Specialist)
description:
About the job
        


        
                  At Aera, we are bringing technology, innovation, passion, and vision together to help our clients transform their enterprise businesses. We deliver the Cognitive Technology that enables Decision Intelligence: the Aera Decision Cloud™ that connects you with your business and autonomously orchestrates your operations.
The Internship program is to help a fresh engineering graduate to grow into the role of a technical trainer in the enablement team at Aera. You will be mentored to deliver virtual training, maintain training sandboxes, design, develop and deliver assignments.
Your internship program will be run by two senior enablement practitioners who are mandated to implement the new paradigm of digital and virtual learning programs. The programs go beyond traditional learning techniques and will use digital adoption strategies to optimize investments in the Aera Platform for all stakeholders.
Technical training is as much about training delivery, learner management, and facilitation as it is about programming, problem-solving and technical solutioning. You will get to experience both the areas
Responsibilities
Assist the Senior Enablement Specialist with delivering trainingTroubleshoot issues on training Sandbox and raise necessary ticketsWork on creating assignments for learnersShadow the Senior Enablement Specialist on virtual sessionsIdentify and understand the unique enablement, training and certification Work with subject matter experts across multiple functions such as Architects, and Skill Developers to help build training environments that reflect real work scenariosResponsible for maintenance of training instances of the product/platformWork with subject matter experts and instructional designers to develop Use cases, product simulations and training data required
About You
Bachelor’s Degree in Computer Science or IT Excellent communication and presentation skillsExperience working with SQLFamiliarity with workflows in programming concept
Benefits Of The Program
Paid Internship ProgramChallenging work and meaningful development opportunities.Exposure to high-quality clients we work withExposure to modern training techniques
At Aera, our purpose is to enable a sustainable, efficient, and intelligent world with Cognitive Automation. Our Cognitive Operating System is increasingly used by the world's largest companies to fundamentally transform their organizations and how work is done.
If you share our passion for fundamentally transforming how people work — from people working machines, to machines working, guided by people, you’ve met your match. Headquartered in Mountain View, California, we're growing fast, with teams in Mountain View and San Francisco (California), Bucharest and Cluj-Napoca (Romania), Paris (France), Munich (Germany), London (UK), Pune, and Bangalore (India), Sydney (Australia) and Singapore.
So join us, and let’s build the future of work together!
Aera Technology is an equal-opportunity employer. Qualified applicants will receive consideration for employment without regard to race, color, religion, sex, sexual orientation, gender perception or identity, national origin, age, marital status, protected veteran status, or disability status.

IndoAsian, an Indian-origin brand with a legacy of consumer trust established over six decades ago, is proud to be a part of the Legrand Group. title: Intern - LMI Content Developer
description:
About the job
        


        
                  At Lilly, we unite caring with discovery to make life better for people around the world. We are a global healthcare leader headquartered in Indianapolis, Indiana. Our 35,000 employees around the world work to discover and bring life-changing medicines to those who need them, improve the understanding and management of disease, and give back to our communities through philanthropy and volunteerism. We give our best effort to our work, and we put people first. We’re looking for people who are determined to make life better for people around the world.

Job Description

The LMI-CLS team consults with business partners to provide effective learning solutions for our global sales and marketing partners. As Content Developer Intern, you’ll be responsible to apply contemporary adult learning principles in the design, creation, coordination, and implementation of learning content. Throughout your internship, you’ll assist your team and the business by creating effective, high quality eLearning solutions from start to finish.

This Role Involves
Understanding Lilly’s culture, organizational structure, roles, and practicesComprehending project/content and working as per team’s best practicesAssisting the senior developers/ mentors by ensuring designing, developing, and delivering high quality learning solutions

Functional Requirements

title: Summer Internship 2023 – Analyst, Gas, Power and, Climate Solutions
description:
About the job
        


        
                  The Role: S&P Global Commodity Insights Summer Internship Programme is a 10-week summer training program commencing in June 2023.

S&P Global Commodity Insights is seeking intern candidates that will be involved in working directly within our Gas, Power, and Climate Solutions (GPCS) research and analytics teams. The intern will have a front-row seat in a leading research organization’s work in energy markets and energy transition across the globe. As a part of the internship, candidates will have the opportunity to work on market fundamentals modelling and forecasting, policy analysis, conventional and renewable energies, new technology trends, carbon markets, among others.

The Location: Beijing, Gurgaon, Penang, Singapore, London, Paris, Washington, DC (all in-person)

The Team/The Business: You will be part of the global GPCS team and contribute to the wide-ranging research areas that we address across the globe including natural and low-carbon gases, power and renewables, clean energy technologies, carbon and environmental markets, as well as long-term scenario planning. We are looking for high achievers from a diverse pool of undergraduate & postgraduate institutions who are passionate about energy markets and energy transition and want to develop their career in a dynamic, high performing, and multicultural team. Ideal candidates need to be able to work well within a team and demonstrate exceptional learning agility, creativity, and problem-solving ability.

What’s In It For You
10-week summer internship commencing in June 2023.Opportunity to learn about the fundamentals of how energy markets work and how they impact the ongoing energy transitionExposure to world-class thought leaders in each of the areas as well as to companies that operate in the energy sectorReceive hands-on research and analytics training and experiences with senior researchersPotential opportunity to join the team as a full-time analyst post-graduation
Responsibilities
Conducting research and analysis as well as interacting with industry players to further solidify and enhance various research areas in GPCS.Helping to collect, manage, and analyze market data and information. Track and identify market trends in particular energy sectors in defined geographies.Supporting research on energy policies, costs, supply, demand, and prices as well as modelling efforts (e.g., power dispatch models) for forecasting purposes. Supporting in creation of market reports based on the research and analysis above.Working and coordinating closely with a large team of global analysts across the energy markets to align viewpoints, data, and outlooks.Supporting clients by answering questions in a comprehensive and timely manner via email, phone call, or in-person presentation.Working with product management, marketing, and commercial teams to promote our research among clients and prospects.
What We’re Looking For
Fully matriculated undergraduate or graduate students in penultimate year of study (graduation date: Winter 2023 or Summer 2024)All majors are welcome, with preference given to those that have taken classes in the sciences and economicsStrong interest in energy and climate changeStrong quantitative skills, including experience using Excel and/or other data analytics toolsStrong verbal and written communication skillsAbility to pick up new knowledge and multi-taskProblem-solving, time-management, attention to detail, and interpersonal skills to work efficiently with colleagues and clients
Equal Opportunity Employer

S&P Global is an equal opportunity employer and all qualified candidates will receive consideration for employment without regard to race/ethnicity, color, religion, sex, sexual orientation, gender identity, national origin, age, disability, marital status, military veteran status, unemployment status, or any other status protected by law. Only electronic job submissions will be considered for employment.

If you need an accommodation during the application process due to a disability, please send an email to: EEO.Compliance@spglobal.com and your request will be forwarded to the appropriate person. 

US Candidates Only:  The EEO is the Law Poster http://www.dol.gov/ofccp/regs/compliance/posters/pdf/eeopost.pdf describes discrimination protections under federal law.

title: Intern - Strategy & Business Development
description:
About the job
        


        
                  PATH is a global nonprofit dedicated to achieving health equity. With more than 40 years of experience forging multisector partnerships, and with expertise in science, economics, technology, advocacy, and dozens of other specialties, PATH develops and scales up innovative solutions to the world’s most pressing health challenges.

PATH is looking for highly motivated, self-starter, and enthusiastic interns to work with the young and dynamic Strategy and Business Development team. The interns will get an opportunity to operate in a zestful and evolving environment to contribute to a growing portfolio of impactful work in public health. Key responsibilities will be to provide support on activities including, but not limited to knowledge management, assistance in developing concept notes and proposals, decks and program strategy documents for PATH India programs. He/she will also have the opportunity to work closely with all program verticals, including Neglected Tropical Diseases, Tuberculosis and HIV, Mother and Child Health and Nutrition, Vaccines, Impact Lab, and digital health.

Responsibilities

As a strategy and BD intern, your responsibilities will include, but are not limited to the following:
Undertake knowledge management by collecting and collating information available under each vertical. This would also include creating and updating program strategy documents and decks.Contribute to a country business development action planCoordinate with Business Development, Strategic Partnerships and Philanthropy, and global teams at PATH to streamline proposal development Conceptualize, coordinate and present at eventsUndertake landscape assessments to seek, sense and analyze trends in the funding environment and develop strategy documents for each vertical to achieve desired objectives.Conduct secondary research and landscape analysis for material contributing to the development of concept notes and proposalsSupport the team in coordinating the proposal development process with PATH internal and external stakeholdersSupport the team in preparing for meetings with potential donors, including conducting background research on meeting participants and organization focus areas
Required Skills

Required Experience
Enrolled in a Bachelor’s/Master’s degree at a reputed graduate school. Fresh graduates in management or public health are encouraged to apply.Excellent communication and interpersonal skills and ability to work effectively in a complex environmentComfort with collaborating across all levels of leadership internallyBasic research and analytical skills, including the ability to proactively identify opportunitiesDemonstrated ability to multi-task and thrive in fast-paced, high-pressureExcellent command over MS Office applications, especially MS Word, MS Excel, and MS PowerPointExcellent in written and spoken English
Skills To Be Developed And/or Expanded During Internship
Conducting background research on public health donor priorities, landscape and successful proposalsPreparation of collateral to clearly demonstrate value proposition of an NGO to prospective donors and partnersKnowledge of global health, digital health, nonprofit management, and business developmentFostering collaboration and coordination among team membersExposure to PATH software and programs
Work Location: New Delhi
Please include a cover letter with your resume describing your interest and how you meet the qualifications. 
Must have legal authorization to work in India.

PATH is dedicated to building an inclusive workforce where diversity is valued.

PATH is an equal opportunity employer. Every qualified applicant will be considered for employment. PATH does not discriminate based on race, color, religion, gender, gender identity or orientation, genetic information, age, national origin, marital status, disability status, political ideology, military or protected veteran status, or any other characteristic protected by applicable federal, state, or local law.
PATH has become aware of scams involving false job offers. *
Please Advise
PATH will never ask for a fee during any stage of the recruitment process.All active jobs are advertised directly on our career page.Official PATH emails will always arrive from an @path.org address or @silkroad.com address.
Please report any suspicious communications to careersitehelp@path.org.

title: Virtual Assistance work from home job/internship at Holy Infotech
description:
About the job
        

                
  


  
      This job is sourced from a job board.
      Learn more
  


        
                  About Holy Infotech
Holy Infotech is a leading IT firm that provides subcontracting services to large telecommunication companies. The company also offers support to various businesses such as Holy Mortgages and Holy Pathways. Additionally, Holy Infotech is involved in the recruitment of talented individuals from all around the world to work on various projects. With its expertise in the field of IT and telecommunications, Holy Infotech is a trusted partner for businesses in need of reliable and efficient technical services.
Activity on Internshala
Hiring since March 2023
1 opportunity posted
About The Work From Home Job/internship
I am excited to announce an internship opportunity at my company, Holy Infotech. We are looking for a student who can help us stay up to date with our online presence, including managing our websites, creating social media posts, and editing videos.
As the director of Holy Infotech, I am responsible for overseeing our consulting services that assist clients in hiring and recruiting talent from all around the world. We also own other businesses, including Holy Mortgages, a financial company that provides mortgage and financial advice, and Holy Pathways, an education consulting business. Our companies operate from Canada.
Selected Intern's Day-to-day Responsibilities Include
 Handling our social media accounts Creating posts for Instagram, Facebook, etc. using Canva Editing videos on a weekly basis
Our websites are developed using Wix and WordPress, and the student will be required to keep them up to date. Students must be able to work in the EST zone for daily standup. The work hours will be flexible.
The internship will require the student to work for 25-30 hours per week, and we are willing to pay Rs.10,000-12,000 per month. The internship will last for three months with the potential for a full-time position, subject to the student's performance. We will also offer a bonus based on the intern's performance, and the payment will be made directly to the student's account.
Skill(s) required
Canva Facebook Ads Facebook Marketing Google Suite (G Suite) Social Media Marketing WordPress
Earn certifications in these skills
Learn Social Media Marketing
Learn WordPress
Learn Facebook Marketing
Who can apply
Only Those Candidates Can Apply Who
 are available for the work from home job/internship can start the work from home job/internship between 22nd Mar'23 and 26th Apr'23 are available for duration of 3 months have relevant skills and interests Women wanting to start/restart their career can also apply.

Letter of recommendation Flexible work hours

title: Intern
description:
About the job
        


        
                  About Our Group
Hardware Engineering group is involved in developing the Storage enclosure products for Seagate and potential external customers. The group is committed to product development, innovation, and revenue growth through emerging technologies and products using Harvest, Grow, and Win strategy.
About The Role - You Will
 Understand the design details of the storage system Work closely with the firmware team to understand the product architecture and implementation Go through the sustaining issues to understand the product features Develop features/modules Complete internship project as per plan
About You
 You will possess passion and commitment for the software development lifecycle and problem-solving Positive attitude is necessary
Your Experience Includes
 RAID-based storage system architectures Knowledge of Storage media types, communication media Exposure to protocols, typical capacity, throughput, and latency values, and failure modes Understanding of IO generation tools Experience im Manual and automated testing Understanding of Industry software test processes and practices
Location:
Pune, India
Our site in Pune is dynamic, both in our cutting-edge, innovative work, as well as our vibrant on-site food, and athletic and personal development opportunities for our 400+ employees. You can enjoy breakfast, lunch, or dinner from one of four cafeterias in the park. Take a break from your workday and participate in one of our many walkathons or compete against your colleagues in carrom, chess and table tennis. Learn about a technical topic outside your area of expertise at one of our monthly Technical Speaker Series, or attend one of the frequent on-site cultural festivals, celebrations, and community volunteer opportunities.

title: Nutrition, Intern
description:
About the job
        


        
                  Internship Title: Nutrition, Intern

Location: New Delhi

PATH is a global nonprofit dedicated to achieving health equity. With more than 40 years of experience forging multisector partnerships, and with expertise in science, economics, technology, advocacy, and dozens of other specialties, PATH develops and scales up innovative solutions to the world’s most pressing health challenges.

Description Of The E-project The Intern Will Complete

The intern will contribute towards the development of knowledge management products for Nutrition projects under the Family Health portfolio.

Description of overall learning objectives and goals for the internship/benefit to the Intern: 

The Intern will engage with the project team to develop various learning documents emanating from project experience and contribute to nutrition expertise.

Brief Description Of Required Skills/experience The Intern Should Possess
Graduate/Postgraduate (Public Health, Nutrition, Food Science, Food Technology) from Premier institutes.Excellent communication skills (Verbal and written)Proficiency in MS office.
Required Skills

Required Experience

Skills To Be Developed And/or Expanded During Internship
Project managementStakeholder managementBusiness communication.Deeper knowledge of Nutrition.Documentation and writing skills.
Proposed Activities
Perform secondary research to inform program knowledge management.Prepare technical briefs for the program knowledge management.Assist in day-to-day Project Management activities including meetings, workshops, etc.Assist in developing necessary reports.
Description of what will be used to evaluate the Intern’s performance/progress toward meeting learning objectives and goals:
Monthly Presentations.
Must have legal authorization to work in India.

PATH is dedicated to building an inclusive workforce where diversity is valued.

PATH is an equal opportunity employer. Every qualified applicant will be considered for employment. PATH does not discriminate based on race, color, religion, gender, gender identity or orientation, genetic information, age, national origin, marital status, disability status, political ideology, military or protected veteran status, or any other characteristic protected by applicable federal, state, or local law.
PATH has become aware of scams involving false job offers. *
Please Advise
PATH will never ask for a fee during any stage of the recruitment process.All active jobs are advertised directly on our career page.Official PATH emails will always arrive from an @path.org address or @silkroad.com address. 
Please report any suspicious communications to careersitehelp@path.org.

title: Intern- Energy Team
description:
About the job
        


        
                  Renewable Energy Internship (Summer 2023)
Commercial Energy I
Interested in pursuing a career in the rapidly evolving global energy market—one where you’ll work directly with the energy companies, utilities and government agencies charged with creating viable solutions to today’s most pressing energy challenges? Then consider ICF. We’re looking for Interns to join our dynamic energy advisory team and help us lead the charge.
Job Description
ICF is hiring Interns to help grow our Indian and global energy consulting business. Interns contribute to the development of innovative, analytical, high quality and commercially relevant products and services, typically working on multiple projects with all levels of staff.
Our Interns are given opportunities to work on assignments that foster growth and allow them to develop solutions within the renewable energy sector. Through client engagements, colleague and peer interactions, and specialized training, ICF Interns develop subject matter expertise and project management skills.
This opportunity is available to current undergraduate and graduate level students seeking internships during summer 2023 (full-time) in our New Delhi office (will also consider remote work). Please clearly specify on your cover letter your expected dates of availability.
Key Responsibilities
Researching upcoming solar technologies including modules, inverters, mounting systems and trackers.Develop tools in python to assess aspects of trackers at every hour of the day.Develop battery storage model.Explore PV production platforms.Undertake reviews of technical documents.Contribute to the development and enhancement of ICF proprietary models and databases.
Basic Qualifications
Experience in developing and managing databases and data analysis.Currently enrolled in a Bachelor's or a Master’s degree program in Engineering or Computer Sciences. Electrical, Mechanical, Aerospace, or Renewable Energy engineering degree programs.Knowledge of SQL, Excel VBA, Microsoft Office, PVsyst, MATLAB, Python, and/or other basic software tools.Strong interest in Renewable Energy.Candidates seeking long-term careers in the energy industry are highly encouraged to apply.
Personal Traits/Experience
Ability to work autonomously with minimal guidance and ability to thrive in group solutions.A willingness to dive into a new topic and learn as-needed to answer various technical questions.Passion for the energy industry.A passion for solving complex problems.Strong intellectual curiosity, and enthusiasm to learn beyond what is required for daily tasks.Entrepreneurial spirit.Capability to extract tends and extrapolate understand from a set of data.
About ICF
ICF (NASDAQ:ICFI) is a global consulting services company with over 7,000 full- and part-time employees, but we are not your typical consultants. At ICF, business analysts and policy specialists work together with digital strategists, data scientists and creatives. We combine unmatched industry expertise with cutting-edge engagement capabilities to help organizations solve their most complex challenges. Since 1969, public and private sector clients have worked with ICF to navigate change and shape the future. Learn more at icf.com.
Working at ICF
Working at ICF means applying a passion for meaningful work with intellectual rigor to help solve the leading issues of our day. Smart, compassionate, innovative, committed, ICF employees tackle unprecedented challenges to benefit people, businesses, and governments around the globe. We believe in collaboration, mutual respect, open communication, and opportunity for growth.
New Delhi, India (II77)

title: Intern
description:
About the job
        


        
                  About Our Group
Hardware Engineering group is involved in developing the Storage enclosure products for Seagate and potential external customers. The group is committed to product development, innovation, and revenue growth through emerging technologies and products using Harvest, Grow, and Win strategy.
About The Role - You Will
 Understand the design details of the storage system. Work closely with the firmware team to understand the product architecture and implementation Go through the sustaining issues to understand the product features Develop features/modules Complete internship project as per plan
About You
 You will possess passion and commitment for the software development lifecycle and problem-solving Positive attitude is necessary.
Your Experience Includes
 Knowledge of RAID-based storage system architectures Storage media types, communication media Exposure to protocols, typical capacity, throughput, and latency values, and failure modes Experience with IO generation tools Understanding of Manual and automated testing Industry software test processes and practices
Location:
Pune, India
Our site in Pune is dynamic, both in our cutting-edge, innovative work, as well as our vibrant on-site food, and athletic and personal development opportunities for our 400+ employees. You can enjoy breakfast, lunch, or dinner from one of four cafeterias in the park. Take a break from your workday and participate in one of our many walkathons or compete against your colleagues in carrom, chess and table tennis. Learn about a technical topic outside your area of expertise at one of our monthly Technical Speaker Series, or attend one of the frequent on-site cultural festivals, celebrations, and community volunteer opportunities.

title: Intern - Family Health Team
description:
About the job
        


        
                  PATH is a global nonprofit dedicated to achieving health equity. With more than 40 years of experience forging multisector partnerships, and with expertise in science, economics, technology, advocacy, and dozens of other specialties, PATH develops and scales up innovative solutions to the world’s most pressing health challenges.

The position will work with PATH’s Family Health Program team. The family health program looks to deliver key projects and initiatives on Maternal and Child Health, Sexual and Reproductive Health, and Nutrition. PATH is strengthening the Family Planning Supply Chain, Rice Fortification, Comprehensive Lactation Management centers, landscaping for Anemia interventions, Respiratory Care management, and Tools for Integrated Management of Childhood Illnesses. This Internship opportunity will help the individual gain knowledge and experience across the breadth of the Family Health system in India. The intern will work on exciting problems in the Family Health domain to contribute to impacting millions of lives.

Work Location – Remote / New Delhi

Duration – Three months, full-time internship

Hiring on a rolling basis

Overall learning goals for the Intern include but are not limited to:
Develop a broad understanding of the Family Health thematic area in the public health Ecosystem in India.Perform Research and Data Analysis for informing Program Strategy.Develop Technical reports and briefs for Program Deliverables and Proposals.Ensure Program Deliverables are on track by deploying and supporting Project Management processes and participating in planning discussions.
Responsibilities

As a part of the Family Health Program, the Intern will perform the following duties and deliverables:
Perform Data Analysis to inform Program Strategy.Perform Secondary Research to inform Program Strategy.Prepare Technical reports for the Program.Perform Project Management activities.Attend team meetings/calls and take part in planning and implementation of activities.
Skills To Be Developed And/or Expanded During Internship
Data analysisSecondary researchTechnical report writingProject ManagementPresentation skillsStrategic thinking skills
Required Skills

Required Experience
The Intern should possess the following skills/ experience for performing their activities:Master’s Degree (MBA/MPH/MHA/PGDM/PGDBA or similar degrees)Candidates with bachelor’s Degree with experience may also apply.Quantitative and Qualitative Analysis Skills.
